title_text: "Steele's ""Soldier's Service and Pay Book"" Soldier's Service and Pay Book
subject_terms_1: This is a soldier's service and pay book It has a brown cover. The cover is slightly faded and frayed along the edges. The book is inscribed in black in the center. At the top, there is a handwritten inscription in black ink. documents (object genre)
